name: Union Bank of Nigeria Plc
description: Union Bank of Nigeria Plc is a leading financial institution in Nigeria, established in 1917. The bank provides a comprehensive range of financial services to individuals, SMEs, and corporate clients across the country. With a strong commitment to delivering exceptional customer service, Union Bank focuses on leveraging technology to enhance banking experiences. The bank offers a variety of products, including savings and current accounts, loans, mortgages, and investment services. Union Bank has made significant strides in digital banking, launching innovative platforms such as UnionMobile and UnionOnline to facilitate seamless banking transactions. The bank is dedicated to financial inclusion, aiming to provide accessible banking solutions to underserved communities. Union Bank also engages in various corporate social responsibility initiatives, promoting education, health, and environmental sustainability. With a robust network of branches and ATMs, Union Bank aims to be the financial partner of choice for millions of Nigerians.
